page.title: 15LEISURE
page.content: Their best player is Tony Nash, who has a handicap of 1. A famous story belong to the club. Resulting in the course being next to a railway line, it is said that long ago, someone hit a golf ball into a train going to London- surely the longest hit ever! The club has 18 holes. Par running track is the main athletic centre in Mid-Cornwall. It is the base for Par Athletic Club and hosts many athletic meetings. Par Stadium is the major go-kart racing track in Cornwall. Stock-car racing is held there every Tuesday at 8:00pm. Also held there is a Sunday market and, maybe once or twice a year a fair.
